title: Revolution Saints - Revolution Saints( Deluxe Edition )2015 ak
description:
Revolution Saints is an American supergroup formed by Jack Blades of Night Ranger, Damn Yankees and Shaw Blades; Deen Castronovo of Journey, Ozzy Osbourne, Bad English and Hardline; and Doug Aldrich of Whitesnake, Dio, Lion, and Burning Rain.

Their self-titled debut album will be released on February 24, 2015.

personal

    Jack Blades - Bass and Vocals
    Deen Castronovo - Lead Vocals and Drums
    Doug Aldrich - Guitar

Personnel

    Deen Castronovo - drums, lead & backing vocals
    Jack Blades - bass guitar, backing vocals, co-lead vocals on "Turn Back Time" and "Way to the Sun"
    Doug Aldrich - guitars

Additional personnel

    Alessandro Del Vecchio - keyboards, backing vocals, production
    Arnel Pineda - co-lead vocals on "You're Not Alone"
    Neal Schon - guitar solo on "Way to the Sun"
    Serafino Perugino - executive producer
